content:
,
本件保存七年
02-62- 1371 +
May 3, 2
MEMORANDUM
To : Mr. R. L. Hirshberg Program Officer, US AID/C From .C. c. Chang Chief, Second Division
Subject : Excess Equipment
Reference is made to the attached copy of TPC letter No. 9-135 dated April 26, 1962.
In the above letter, TPC requested that drill bits be procured. If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition and shipment to Taiwan.
Encl. copy of TPC letter
cc. TPC JGWhite (with copy of TPC letter)
BES (
. $ )
2D (
特 1 )
E-16.13.2
51. 3. 100×200
國史馆 Academia Historica
U
477
